attributes.action: Bring back national service to teach the new generation respect and how to earn a living
attributes.additional_details:
Why should so many young people be aloud to get away with disrespecting the older generation.
If parents cant teach their own children respect they should do national service to become better people.
This will not only give them jobs after school but help them to stay out of trouble,away from drugs and out of the dole office.
